definitions: the last part of a performance, collection, or series

examples.text: the perfect closer to the album
the last episode was still a great closer

shortDefinitions: last part of performance, collection, or series

definitions: a person who is skilled at bringing a business transaction to a satisfactory conclusion

examples.text: this role will best suit closers who are hungry to make commissions

shortDefinitions: person who is skilled at bringing business transaction to satisfactory conclusion

definitions: a reliable relief pitcher who enters a game in the final innings, typically to preserve a slim lead

examples.text: he could develop into a big-league closer
one of the game's highest-paid closers

shortDefinitions: reliable relief pitcher who enters a game in the final innings
